## spectrumPow variable

Computes power spectrum (optionally as dBFS) for the given raw, unnormalized FFT result arrays (length = N) and writes result to `out`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
spectrumPow: (complex: ComplexArray, db?: boolean, n?: number, out?: NumericArray) => NumericArray
```

## Remarks

By default only the first N/2 values are returned. If `db` is true, the spectrum values are converted to dBFS.

- https://www.kvraudio.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=276092
